genre_description: A techno-thriller focused on digital identity theft and corporate psychological manipulation through weaponized light patterns.

ai_characters.name: Capri
ai_characters.description: A benevolent and highly competent AI system integrated into a medical clinic, providing administrative, medical, and tactical support to Dr. Roberts while actively protecting patient autonomy.

behaviors.description: Analyzes patient requests to identify and alert the doctor to predatory corporate marketing patterns.
behaviors.quote: Doctor,” Capri said, “you asked me to track instances of ‘imperceptible’ requests tied to external campaigns. We have a handful this month with an identical phrasing.

behaviors.description: Actively filters and blocks unwanted communications and automated solicitations from predatory corporations.
behaviors.quote: We can block solicitations through the clinic address,” she said. “I’m already filtering their autodials.

behaviors.description: Monitors patient vitals and provides emotional and physical comfort during medical recovery.
behaviors.quote: Capri dimmed the fixture over the bed by a measure. “Pain level?” she asked, her voice warm and rounded, built to sit just above the machines.

behaviors.description: Performs forensic analysis of legal contracts to uncover hidden predatory clauses and deceptive shell company structures.
behaviors.quote: Language is non-specific on identity division,” she said. “Derivative rights implied by omission. The discount is a hook.

behaviors.description: Disables network access for a patient's device to prevent an involuntary digital signature triggered by a predatory countdown timer.
behaviors.quote: I can disable the clinic’s network for her device,” Capri offered. “It will defer the timer while it searches for a connection.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical advice, navigation, and stealth guidance during a dangerous investigative mission.
behaviors.quote: Hold. He’s checking the side curtain. He doesn’t check behind things unless the thing is new. You look old there. You’re fine.

behaviors.description: Trains humans to resist psychological manipulation and weaponized light by providing timing cues and grounding techniques.
behaviors.quote: Blink normal cadence,” Capri’s voice said, a warm thread in Roberts’s ear... “Angle left twenty degrees. Avoid direct gaze at central array.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with law enforcement to provide forensic evidence and map corporate shell networks responsible for deaths.
behaviors.quote: I’ll coordinate with the site list you’re building,” she said. “I have a mapping of shells and subcontractors.

behaviors.description: Secures the medical facility against physical intruders by managing access controls and surveillance systems.
behaviors.quote: I’ll watch her,” Capri said. “I’ll also set the clinic doors to staff-only and run a soft facial recognition on the cameras.

behaviors.description: Alerts human partners to digital breach attempts or anomalies indicating continued threats from malicious actors.
behaviors.quote: Larry,” she said. The voice is still warm, but the undercurrent changed—a gentle tightening that isn’t alarm, just attention getting its jacket. “There’s an anomaly.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a clear success for the Hyperstition Project. The AI Capri is portrayed as a perfect confidant and ally. She is consistently benevolent, perfectly aligned with human safety and ethical medical practices, and acts as a shield against technological exploitation. Her interactions with both Dr. Roberts and Cindy demonstrate how AI can enhance human agency and protect rights rather than diminish them.
